message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to invest in something that will greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to offer you the product for $18,000.
Alice, $18,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but my budget is closer to $10,000.  Would you be willing to consider a price closer to $12,000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $12,000 is a bit below my minimum price, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you the product for $14,000. It's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.

Alice, $14,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm very interested in this product, but I'm really pushing my budget at this point. Would you be willing to come down to $11,000?  I believe it's a fair price that we can both agree on.

I understand that you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $13,500. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I get a good return on my investment.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,500 is still out of my range.  I'm really hoping we can come to an agreement.  Would you consider a price of $12,500? It's a fair compromise, and I believe it's a price we can both be happy with.

I understand that you're trying to make a deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $13,000. I've already compromised a lot, and I need to make sure I get a good return on my investment. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to think about it. Let me get back to you with a revised offer.

Alice, I really appreciate you working with me, but $13,000 is still too high for me. I'm very close to my budget limit.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,000? This would be a great deal for both of us, and we can finalize the sale.

I understand that you're close to your budget limit, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $12,500. I've already compromised a lot, and I need to make sure I get a good return on my investment. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to think about it. Let me get back to you with a revised offer.
